statements: SELECT * FROM patient_health_data;
SELECT patient_id, heart_rate FROM patient_health_data WHERE temperature > 98.6;
SELECT activity_type, step_count FROM patient_health_data WHERE heart_rate < 60;
SELECT patient_id, temperature, activity_type FROM patient_health_data WHERE step_count > 10000;
SELECT heart_rate, temperature FROM patient_health_data ORDER BY heart_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM patient_health_data WHERE temperature > 98.6 ORDER BY patient_id DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT patient_id, heart_rate, temperature FROM patient_health_data WHERE step_count > 1000 AND activity_type = 'Running';
SELECT patient_id, AVG(temperature) AS avg_temperature, MAX(heart_rate) AS max_heart_rate FROM patient_health_data GROUP BY patient_id HAVING AVG(temperature) > 97.5;
SELECT AVG(temperature) AS avg_temperature, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM patient_health_data WHERE activity_type LIKE '%Walking%';
SELECT * FROM patient_health_data WHERE heart_rate BETWEEN 60 AND 100 ORDER BY temperature DESC, patient_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM patient_health_data;
SELECT patient_id, heart_rate FROM patient_health_data ORDER BY heart_rate DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT patient_id FROM monitoring_data;
SELECT patient_id, temperature FROM monitoring_data WHERE temperature > 98.6;
SELECT patient_id, steps_count FROM patient_health_data WHERE steps_count > 10000 ORDER BY steps_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM patient_health_data WHERE heart_rate > 80 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT patient_id, heart_rate, steps_count FROM patient_health_data WHERE steps_count < 5000 ORDER BY steps_count ASC;
SELECT max(temperature) AS max_temperature, min(oxygen_level) AS min_oxygen_level FROM monitoring_data WHERE patient_id = 10;
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM monitoring_data GROUP BY patient_id HAVING total_records > 3;
SELECT patient_id, AVG(heart_rate) AS avg_heart_rate, AVG(steps_count) AS avg_steps_count FROM patient_health_data GROUP BY patient_id ORDER BY avg_heart_rate DESC;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, gender FROM Patients ORDER BY gender DESC;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, weight_kg FROM Patients WHERE weight_kg > 70;
SELECT * FROM HealthData WHERE heart_rate > 100;
SELECT date, hours_slept, sleep_quality FROM SleepData ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patients ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT patient_name, gender, weight_kg FROM Patients WHERE gender='Female' AND weight_kg > 70;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, heart_rate, steps FROM Patients INNER JOIN HealthData ON Patients.patient_id = HealthData.patient_id WHERE heart_rate > 100 AND steps > 5000;
SELECT patient_id, date, hours_slept, sleep_quality FROM SleepData WHERE hours_slept >= 7.5 AND sleep_quality >= 3 ORDER BY date ASC;

SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, heart_rate, calories_burned FROM Patients INNER JOIN HealthData ON Patients.patient_id = HealthData.patient_id INNER JOIN SleepData ON Patients.patient_id = SleepData.patient_id WHERE heart_rate > 120 AND calories_burned > 500 ORDER BY heart_rate DESC, calories_burned ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT name, age FROM patients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT patient_id, name, gender FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT AVG(height) as avg_height, AVG(weight) as avg_weight FROM patients;
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(*) as heart_rate_count FROM heart_rate GROUP BY patient_id ORDER BY heart_rate_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT patient_id, name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT patient_id, height, weight FROM patients WHERE height > 170 AND weight < 70 ORDER BY height DESC;
SELECT p.name, h.rate, s.steps_count FROM patients p JOIN heart_rate h ON p.patient_id = h.patient_id JOIN steps s ON p.patient_id = s.patient_id ORDER BY h.timestamp DESC;
SELECT p.name, s.hours_slept, s.quality FROM patients p JOIN sleep s ON p.patient_id = s.patient_id WHERE s.hours_slept > 7 ORDER BY s.timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_id, name, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT patient_id, name, duration_in_minutes FROM SleepData WHERE duration_in_minutes >= 480;
SELECT patient_id, steps, recorded_at FROM StepCount ORDER BY recorded_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT name, age FROM Patients WHERE gender='Male' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT heart_rate_value, recorded_at FROM HeartRate JOIN Patients ON HeartRate.patient_id = Patients.patient_id WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY recorded_at ASC;
SELECT duration_in_minutes FROM SleepData WHERE duration_in_minutes > 480;
SELECT temperature_value, recorded_at FROM Temperature WHERE patient_id='a7ff5170-1bf2-4483-8103-3e4eacc0a875';
